text:
ELEMENTS INTERACTIVE | Senior Android and iOS positions | Almere, The Netherlands and Barcelona, Spain | Full-time, ONSITE, Visa

We're a digital agency building web and mobile applications for a wide range of clients with HQ in the Netherlands. Our team is made of over 60 professionals from around the world, all passionate about technology, learning and sharing our knowledge. Right now we are looking for experienced mobile developers for both our offices, in Almere and in Barcelona. Check our current tech stack here https://stackshare.io/elements-interactive#technology

OUR PERKS

* budget for conferences/events/courses to stay on top of your skills * flexible working hours (+occasional WFH) * regular fun events with the team * travel costs compensated (if home <==> office >10km) * pension plan * free lunch, snacks, unlimited freshly ground coffee every day

More info & our projects ==> https://www.elements.nl

APPLY HERE

Almere, NL

Senior Android Developer https://elementsinteractive.workable.com/j/C6B4230681

Senior iOS Developer https://elementsinteractive.workable.com/j/0DCF2806AC
